$comment: Embedding service configuration for Memory System v4
$provider_description: auto = try local first, then OpenAI, then TF-IDF fallback
$localModel_description: sentence-transformers model for local embeddings (384 dimensions)
$openaiModel_description: OpenAI model for API embeddings (1536 dimensions)
$dimensions_description: Embedding vector dimensions (auto-set based on provider)
$cacheEnabled_description: Cache embeddings to disk for faster repeat queries
$cacheTTLDays_description: How long to keep cached embeddings
$batchSize_description: Max items per batch for embedding generation
